abstract: Breakingviews has outlined the many reasons it believes Oracle is bluffing in its move to pressure BEA Systems into accepting accept its $6.7 billion bid.
lead_paragraph: Breakingviews has outlined the many reasons it believes Oracle is bluffing in its move to pressure BEA Systems into accepting accept its $6.7 billion bid.

headline.main: Is Oracle’s BEA Deadline a Bluff?
